text: Waits given time until the next action. The time can be fixed (defined by the [time] property) or can be asked to the user every time the action is fired (if property [ask = true]).
Time to wait until next action. The unit is definde with the value (ms, s or m). If no unit is provided, default is milliseconds. Examples: 500ms, 3s, 15m.
Ask to the user the time to wait every execution. The given time will override any value of 'time' property.
The given time value is not a valid value.
